topics.body: So I'm just gonna go on a sort of rant, I lucked the fuck out with my step-dad. He's the kindest, most patient, and most understanding man I've had in my life. Well aside from my grandpa. He's never above just hanging out with people. Me especially. He'll just chill out on the couch and watch a movie. But he'll never shy away from giving people a kick in the butt when they need it. He's a good man. And I'm proud to call him my dad.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5539aaa363687257684b1000#post_5539aaa363687257684b1000
That's not a rant.
That's a praise.

Also, the cheese in my cheese sandwich had melted out and started attacking my hand with its hot cheese.

*SANDWICH! WHY HAVE THOU FORSAKEN ME?!*
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5539ab6363687266a6993700#post_5539ab6363687266a6993700
Eat the cheese.
Ignore the pain.
Establish dominance.

topics.body:
Lol
The ravens gathered around the round table. They had never tasted the innards of anything before. 
They were quite jealous of their vulture brethren. For they had never had the opportunity to savour the innards of humans fallen by the wrongdoings of mother nature or fellow man alike.
